about_the_game:
Unleash the Power of Catjinni

Survive. Customize. Conquer.

Dive into a unique, solo-developed indie game featuring RPG and rogue-lite elements. In Catjinni, you'll battle endless waves of monsters and face the formidable Jinn Ifrit, who seeks to plunge the world into darkness with his malevolent ghouls. But fear not—your loyal companion Catjinni is by your side to help you vanquish the shadow realm!

Key Features:

  • Survive Intense Battles through day and night: Face waves of increasingly powerful foes, choosing your fights carefully as the night grows more dangerous.

  • 4 classes: Get to know our heroes: Francis, a blind battle-hardened warrior raised by wind monks; Fluppy, a brilliant scholar and professor who delves into the dark arts; Sushi, a loving mother and descendant of a legendary ice Catalan; and Flocki, a famously fiery detective. Each hero brings their own quests, skills, and strengths to the fight.

  • 3 Biomes: Travel through the portals of Catesla and discover legendary locations such as ancient Egypt, the depths of Atlantis, and the forgotten dungeons of the Catjinns. Each world hides its own secrets, challenges, and treasures!

  • Traps: that can be used for your advantage if your timing is just right.

  • Customize and Upgrade: Enhance your team of cat heroes with powerful gear, use a deep system of skills, and magical weapons as you progress through each quest.

  • Strategic Dice Match: Bet your resources in a high-stakes, easy-to-learn but hard-to-master dice game to earn extra gold for upgrades. But be cautious—a poor roll could spell disaster!

  • 60 unique weapons & skills

  • Battle 50 Challenging Enemy Types

  • Face 18 Fearsome Bosses

Survive 7 Days and Nights

Engage in challenging survival battles against ever-stronger foes. Each cycle brings new dangers, as enemies grow stronger, larger, and begin to glow under the cover of darkness.

Customize

Collect gold, upgrade your gear, and complete quests to enhance the abilities of your four unique cat heroes, unlocking the ultimate weapons of the Catjinn Kings! 

Conquer

Can you harness the strength of the legendary Catjinn Kings and secure your victory?

Roll the Dice and Go All In!

Bet everything and earn extra gold in the strategic Dice Match. Use your winnings for even stronger upgrades, but beware—a roll of the dice could seal your fate!

Catjinni wishes for a spot on your wishlist!

The game combines thrilling combat, lovingly crafted worlds, and endless replayability. Whether you seek challenges, action, or adventure—every wish is welcome in this magical realm! ✨

Join our community on Discord or let us know in the forum what you wish for!

(OPTIONAL) VR-Compatible

Immerse yourself in the game like never before in the genre. Experience the 3D sound and thrilling action in VR as you defeat hordes of foes with your cosmic powers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or above (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: (VR IS OPTIONAL) OpenXR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index controllers or better e.g. Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3S, Quest Pro, Rift S, Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700k / Ryzen 7 CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: (VR IS OPTIONAL) OpenXR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index controllers or better e.g. Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3S, Quest Pro, Rift S, Index

short_description: Catjinni is a single-player survivor-like auto-shooter. Fight endless waves of monsters, gather resources, unlock customizations, upgrade your abilities, and face the sinister Jinn Ifrit to free the world from his darkness! Survive. Customize. Conquer!
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
